label: Music and Entertainment Retail
description: Retailers selling music and entertainment products, including vinyl records, CDs, DVDs, and related accessories.
intents: Find rare or collectible music and entertainment products

subcategories.label: Vinyl Records
subcategories.description: Retailers selling vinyl records, including new releases, rare and collectible items, and second-hand records.

subcategories.label: CDs and DVDs
subcategories.description: Retailers selling CDs and DVDs, including new releases, classic titles, and box sets.

subcategories.label: Music and Entertainment Accessories
subcategories.description: Retailers selling accessories related to music and entertainment products, including slipmats, turntable mats, and record cleaning products.

subcategories.label: Second-hand Music and Entertainment Products
subcategories.description: Retailers specializing in second-hand music and entertainment products, including vinyl records, CDs, and DVDs.

subcategories.label: Rare and Collectible Music and Entertainment Products
subcategories.description: Retailers specializing in rare and collectible music and entertainment products, including vinyl records, CDs, and DVDs.
